summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 5594 for the improvement of West Barrett Street, from West Viewmont Way to 43rd Avenue West, and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues, by paving and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 73565 as amended by Ordinance No. 73787, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
